title: Cement prices up again
body_lines: The price of a 50kg bag of cement has been increased by Rs. 500 with effect from last night, the cement companies confirmed.
They said the decision was made following the current dollar crunch and a fuel price increase.
Accordingly, the revised price of a bag of cement now stands at Rs. 2,350.
Earlier, on March 13, the price of a cement bag, which was at Rs.1,350, increased by Rs. 500. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
